Image.Alt: Two Eagle Scouts given the scout sign in front of an Eagle Scout banner.
Image.Caption: Daniel Albertine (left) & Dustin Albertine (right).

Image.Alt: Five men smiling for the camera in front of an Eagle Scout banner.
Image.Caption: Left to Right: Past T53 ASM/scout Dana Smith, and former T53 Scoutmasters Paul D. Albertine, Paul K. Albertine, Michael W. Corey, Donald K. McKnight. Taken at the Eagle Ceremony for Daniel & Dusty Albertine in 2006.
